title: Moana
creator_credit: Chris Williams, Don Hall, Hurwitz Creative, Lisa Keane, Ron Clements, Walt Disney Animation Studios and John Musker
brief_description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain’s daughter’s island, she answers the Ocean’s call to seek out the demigod to set things right.

constellations_other.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

creator_credit_for_label: Chris Williams, Don Hall, Hurwitz Creative, Lisa Keane, Ron Clements, Walt Disney Animation Studios and John Musker
description:
In ancient Polynesia, the young, soon-to-be-chieftain Moana must enlist the help of the shape-shifting demi-god Maui to find the heart of the goddess Te Fiti, and save her home from encroaching darkness by defying her father and venturing across the sea to confront Te Kā, the volcanic demon who defeated Maui a millennia ago.

Directed by animation legends Ron Clements and John Musker (The Little Mermaid (1989), Aladdin (1992), and featuring the voice talents of Auli’i Cravalho, Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson, Temuera Morrison, Jemaine Clement and Rachel House, as well as songs penned by Hamilton’s Lin-Manuel Miranda, Moana is a breathtaking instant classic from Walt Disney Animation Studios.

This stunning concept art by Lisa Keane explores the budding relationship between baby Moana and the ocean, who becomes an important guide on her adventure.
description_for_label:
In ancient Polynesia, the young, soon-to-be-chieftain Moana must enlist the help of the shape-shifting demi-god Maui to find the heart of the goddess Te Fiti, and save her home from encroaching darkness by defying her father and venturing across the sea to confront Te Kā, the volcanic demon who defeated Maui a millennia ago.

Directed by animation legends Ron Clements and John Musker (The Little Mermaid (1989), Aladdin (1992), and featuring the voice talents of Auli’i Cravalho, Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson, Temuera Morrison, Jemaine Clement and Rachel House, as well as songs penned by Hamilton’s Lin-Manuel Miranda, Moana is a breathtaking instant classic from Walt Disney Animation Studios.

This stunning concept art by Lisa Keane explores the budding relationship between baby Moana and the ocean, who becomes an important guide on her adventure.
